subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Arcidiacono had a 3-point play with 3.6 seconds left in the second overtime to lift visiting No. 9 Villanova to an 82-79 win over Providence.
snippet: Ryan Arcidiacono had a 3-point play with 3.6 seconds left in the second overtime to lift visiting No. 9 Villanova to an 82-79 win over Providence.
